EASTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
LIBYA.
DNC 08, DNC 09.
VESSEL, 80 PERSONS ON BOARD, SANK IN 33-29N 013-04E.

ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO MRCC ROME,
